text.tspan: ⁜ Thesis underwent extensive outside editing for clarity
+ Experiment 1: COANOVA analysis of scores found
main effects for Condition & L1 (Next slides)
+ Experiment 2: Analysis of survey results and multiple
linear regression analysis on time taken to complete task
+ Expansion of discussion relating the field
of experience with register, topic, and
+ Analysis of top 5 topics per media
+ Evaluation of method on collocations added
